metaDescription: Anthony Javier Gómez Niño's CV — Software Engineering Student and Frontend Developer in Quito, Ecuador.
ogDescription: Software Engineering Student focused on frontend development. Projects, experience, skills, and contact.
exp1Title: Frontend Intern — Academic Affairs Office, Escuela Politécnica Nacional (EPN)
exp1Li1: Developed Angular components (templates, styles, responsive layouts) aligned with the institutional design system.
exp1Li2: Customized WordPress secondary themes; created pages and landing pages; improved CSS/HTML bases.
exp1Li3: Translated Figma wireframes into accessible interfaces (semantics, contrast, hierarchy).
exp1Li4: Documented acceptance criteria; version control with Git/GitHub.
exp2Title: Software Developer — University Projects (Escuela Politécnica Nacional)
exp2Li1: Led multiple student teams to deliver academic projects, resulting in the prototypes listed in the "Featured Projects" section.
asideProfileContent: Software Engineering Student focused on building clean, accessible, and responsive interfaces. I translate requirements into user-centered experiences, validating early with stakeholders and iterating quickly.
asideCertsContent: Introduction to Data Analysis with Python — Alison (2023)
proj1Meta: Interface for test registration and results reporting
proj1Li1: Accessible forms with validations and a clear information hierarchy.
proj1Li2: Focus on usability for data entry and reporting views.
proj2Li1: Clean interface for quick balance and category views.
proj3Li1: Simple, readable dashboard with status states and empty views.
edu1Title: B.S. in Software Engineering — Escuela Politécnica Nacional
edu2Title: High School Diploma in Sciences — "Pomasqui" Educational Institution
